Title: Relates to the New York state health care quality and cost containment commission
Summary: Provides that the New York state health care quality and cost containment commission shall: evaluate each mandated benefit; investigate current practices of health plans with regard to the mandated benefit; investigate the potential premium impact of repealing and/or modifying the mandated benefits on all segments of the insurance market; hold at least two public hearings; submit a report to the legislature; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the New York state health care quality and cost containment commission
